short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kaspian searches across all your apps to help you find exactly what you need and discover the things you should know.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Kaspian search engine understands context, language, behavior, and relationships and instantly finds answers to all your questions. Kaspian works by connecting data from all your apps, indexing it in a state of the art search engine and delivering highly relevant and personalized search results.
